item.title: About me
item.author: ck_howard@yahoo.com (Chris Howard)
item.description: A visitor! Hi, you might be wondering who I am. My name is Chris Howard. I am on the cusp of graduating with a B.S. in Information Science from the University of Arizona, and just moved back to the Raleigh area. Have a stumble through my blog posts, you’ll get a feel for my personality. I like to solve problems, usually through software, and here are a few things I’ve enjoyed doing:

item.title: Neverwhere
item.author: ck_howard@yahoo.com (Chris Howard)
item.description: Neverwhere This is the first novel that I’ve read in a very long time, and I chose it because it seemed both intriguing and manageable. Neverwhere was in fact a decent book to start with. The two main characters felt flat, but I have to wonder if this was intentional, and common. For random example, the LOTR trilogy’s Frodo Baggins isn’t all that interesting, yet he frequently comes into contact with people like Smeagle, Gandalf, etc.
